name: Kekcroc's Rainbow Factory DX
description:
This was made specifically for the user zone. The MAC version is called container2.app.zip. You have to unzip it and find the MacOS folder.

To play it use WASD to move and press SPACE to skip the menus or click on the buttons. Press 'L' to return to the title screen. And press the exit button to exit. And that's about it though. I think you have to open the MacOS folder.

For windows just run the EXE file in UnityPlayer.zip. And uhhh profit. Kekcroc says: hopefully it works now lol.
